translation.en: [man over radio] Jane, go do your rounds. I'll come down and cover the desk.
translation.fr:
Jane, vas-y, fais ta ronde.
Je prends ta place.

translation.en: [woman] On my way.
[man] This is Detective Wade Rollins with the Portland PD.
translation.fr:
Ici le lieutenant Wade Rollins,
police de Portland.

translation.en: Leave your name and number, and I'll get back to you.
translation.fr:
Laissez votre nom et numéro.
Je vous rappellerai.

translation.en: Detective, uh… [sniffles] This is Andrea Bowen again.
Sorry. Uh…
I know it's late, but could you call me back when you can? I-- [shudders]
translation.fr:
Je sais qu'il est tard
mais pourriez-vous me rappeler ?

translation.en: I'd really appreciate it.
[shakily] I'm just really scared, and I just…
I feel like he's still watching me.
Detective?
[man] Andrea, this is how the world ends.
translation.fr: Andrea, c'est la fin du monde.

translation.en: [sobbing] No.
-[tense, fast-paced music] -[yelling] No!
Help!
No! No…
Help!
Help! Somebody! No!
translation.fr: Au secours ! Je vous en prie ! Non !

translation.en: No! Help!
-[music continues over speakers] -[woman] Hi, sorry. I had a bottle of wine, but I drank it,
translation.fr:
Désolée. J'avais une bouteille de vin
mais je l'ai bue

translation.en: so I brought you this plant, which I'm now noticing is dead.
translation.fr:
alors je t'apporte cette plante
qui est morte.

translation.en: -I called you five times. -What's wrong?
Jenn, Brian's here.
I know, I'm sorry. It's just-- Originally, you weren't coming, and then Scott invited him,
translation.fr:
Désolée. Au départ, tu ne devais pas venir
puis Scott l'a invité

translation.en: and I had absolutely no idea. So…
Yeah, I could just… tell everyone you're not feeling well, you know?
translation.fr:
Je peux toujours dire
que tu n'étais pas dans ton assiette.

translation.en: I think I need a glass of wine.
translation.fr: J'ai besoin d'un verre de vin.

translation.en: Hey, Jenn!
Hey, Scotty.
Hey, I am so sorry. Yes, yes, he is.
translation.fr:
- Je suis navré.
- Il l'est vraiment.

translation.en: -You don't have to apologize. -He does.
She told me a week ago that you weren't coming.
translation.fr: Elle m'avait dit que tu ne venais pas.

translation.en: -It's her fault. -Okay. Stop.
You don't know what's happening, so walk away.
translation.fr: Ne parle pas sans savoir. Va-t'en.

translation.en: -Okay, that's really cute. -I love you. [chuckles]
[woman] Oh, it's Dr. Meade!
[chuckling] Hi. Dr. Meade.
Hi.
This is Jenn. As in, "The Jenn."
translation.fr: Je vous présente la fameuse Jenn.

translation.en: -Yes. I'm "The Jenn," apparently. -[Meade] Ah!
translation.fr:
Oui. C'est moi, la fameuse Jenn,
apparemment.

translation.en: -Collin Meade. Very nice to meet you. -[woman] He's magical. Changed my life.
translation.fr:
- Collin Meade. Enchanté.
- Il m'a changé la vie, un miracle.

translation.en: I got the promotion, like, a month after working with you?
translation.fr:
Promue un mois
après vous avoir consulté.

translation.en: And this house. You should totally go see him.
translation.fr:
Puis cette maison.
Je te le recommande vivement.

translation.en: What? Everyone needs therapy.
translation.fr: On a tous besoin d'une thérapie.

translation.en: -That's what you say, right? -You know where the ice tongs are?
translation.fr:
- Pas vrai ?
- Tu sais où est la pince à glaçons ?

translation.en: -It's by the ice bucket, Scott. -[Scott] They're not there.
translation.fr:
- Près du seau à glace.
- Non, elle a disparu.

translation.en: Babe. Seriously, every time! I put them beside the ice thing.
translation.fr:
C'est toujours le même cirque.
Je l'ai mise près du seau.

translation.en: It's not every time. [continues inaudibly]
Didn't know therapists could hang out with their clients.
I mean, I follow the rules 99% of the time.
translation.fr: Je suis le règlement 99 % du temps.

translation.en: Maybe 95?
It was nice meeting you.
-Cheers to your new house. -My new house!
translation.fr:
- Santé.
- À ta nouvelle maison. Ma nouvelle maison !

translation.en: So, Brian, how's Foghorn?
translation.fr:
Alors, Brian,
ça va avec "Corne de Brume" ?

translation.en: What's Foghorn?
-It's a stupid name, is what it is. -No, what is it?
translation.fr:
- Un nom débile, c'est tout.
- Non, c'est quoi ?

translation.en: Uh, the guys created a new software for some big audio engineer.
translation.fr:
C'est un nouveau logiciel créé
pour un grand ingénieur du son.

translation.en: I just helped write some of the code.
What about you, Jennifer?
Oh, sorry. What?
Oh, no. I was just, uh--
What do you do?
I'm just-- Um, I'm sort of in between jobs at the moment.
translation.fr: Je suis entre deux boulots pour le moment.

translation.en: She's just being modest. Jenny is actually a killer software engineer.
translation.fr:
Modeste avec ça.
Jenny est une brillante informaticienne.

translation.en: -Impressive. -[Jenn] Mm-hmm.
-So, you two ever worked together? -Brian!
translation.fr:
- Vous avez déjà travaillé ensemble ?
- Brian !

translation.en: Um… Is there sesame in that? [gasps] Oh my God! Brian, I'm so sorry.
translation.fr:
- Ça contient du sésame ?
- Mon Dieu ! Brian, je suis navrée.

translation.en: [Brian] It's okay. It's okay.
Wow, that would've sucked if you died in our new house, dude.
translation.fr:
On veut pas de mort
à notre pendaison de crémaillère.

translation.en: You know what? I think I'm gonna leave this right here.
translation.fr:
Tu sais quoi ?
Je vais garder ça sous la main.

translation.en: Just in case. [chuckles]
-[mouthing] You okay? -Yeah, I'm good.
-Jennifer. -Hm. Yes?
I'm headed out, but, uh, I wanted to leave you this.
translation.fr:
Je dois partir
mais voici ma carte de visite.

translation.en: -In case you're interested. -Okay.
translation.fr:
- Au cas où ça vous intéresserait.
- D'accord.

translation.en: Good night.
You too.
Uber?
Yeah. "Viola will be here in nine minutes."
translation.fr:
Oui. "Viola, votre chauffeure,
arrive dans 9 minutes."

translation.en: Thanks for saving my life.
translation.fr: Merci de m'avoir sauvé la vie.

translation.en: Don't mention it.
Good night, Jenny.
Good night.
Jenny?
Yeah?
I have tried really hard not to bother you, but…
translation.fr:
J'ai fait mon maximum
pour ne pas t'embêter mais…

translation.en: I think about you all the time, and I just--
translation.fr: J'arrête pas de penser à toi et…

translation.en: I miss you.
I didn't ask you to stay away because you bother me.
translation.fr: Tu sais que tu ne m'as jamais embêtée.

translation.en: Yeah. I know--
Then don't say things like that.
translation.fr: Ne dis pas des choses pareilles.

translation.en: When you say things like that, you make me sound like the bad guy,
translation.fr:
En disant ça,
tu me fais passer pour la méchante

translation.en: and I'm not the bad guy. I'm--
translation.fr: et ce n'est pas le cas. Je…

translation.en: You're not the bad guy. I'm not saying you are.
translation.fr: Je ne rejette pas la faute sur toi.

translation.en: I'm just-- Oh God, what am I saying? I don't know what I'm saying.
translation.fr:
Qu'est-ce que je raconte ?
Je ne sais plus ce que je dis.

translation.en: Can I give you a ride home?
-I don't think that's a good id-- -[Brian] It's just a ride, Jenny.
translation.fr:
- Ce n'est pas une bonne idée…
- Ça n'engage à rien.

translation.en: [woman] You guys had sex?
-Do you plan on getting back together? -No.
translation.fr:
- Tu vas te remettre avec lui ?
- Non.

translation.en: I'm stupid. Oh God, I'm the most stupid.
translation.fr:
Je suis bête.
Je suis la reine des imbéciles.

translation.en: Oh my gosh, you're not. You're not stupid. You're just-- You're--
translation.fr:
Mais non, tu n'es pas bête.
Tu es juste…

translation.en: -You're unhappy. -Yeah, everyone's unhappy.
translation.fr:
- Tu es malheureuse.
- Comme tout le monde.

translation.en: No. I'm happy. Scott's happy.
translation.fr:
Non. Moi, je suis heureuse.
Scott est heureux.

translation.en: And for the most part, I hate to say this to you,
translation.fr:
Et, tu ne veux sûrement pas
l'entendre, mais…

translation.en: but Brian is happy.
What am I supposed to say to that?
[clicks tongue] I think you should see Dr. Meade.
translation.fr: Tu devrais consulter le Dr Meade.

translation.en: -Who's Dr. Meade? -My therapist.
-Gina, I'll never do that. -You met him. He's tall, handsome.
translation.fr:
- Oh, non.
- Le type canon d'hier soir.

translation.en: -No. -Come on.
Hear me out, okay? You're isolating. You're unemployed.
translation.fr:
Écoute-moi, d'accord ?
Tu vis en ermite. Tu es au chômage.

translation.en: Don't pretend like you're not.
And you slept with your ex-fiancé last night.
translation.fr: Et tu as couché avec ton ex hier.

translation.en: -Your life is a vortex of crap right now. -This is so much fun.
translation.fr:
- Ta vie est un vrai merdier.
- C'est l'éclate totale.

translation.en: Can you just go for me, please?
-Ugh, fine. Once. -Great!
I made you an appointment for Friday.
translation.fr: Je t'ai pris rendez-vous pour vendredi.

translation.en: You should've seen me when I started with him.
translation.fr:
Vous auriez dû me voir
quand j'ai commencé.

translation.en: Oh, sorry?
I pull my hair.
OCD.
Whatever you're here for, Dr. Meade will fix it.
translation.fr:
Le Dr Meade a une solution
à tous les problèmes.

translation.en: Yeah.
He's waiting for you.
Oh, okay. Um, yeah.
Wow, this is cozy.
Jennifer.
[chuckles] Just feeding the little guy.
You know that having fish reduces stress and lowers blood pressure?
translation.fr:
Vous savez, les poissons réduisent
le stress et la tension artérielle.

translation.en: [Jenn] No, I didn't.
At least that's what I've heard. Who knows if it's true.
translation.fr:
C'est ce qu'on dit.
Qui sait si c'est vrai ?

translation.en: But I do find them calming.
translation.fr: Je trouve qu'ils ont un pouvoir apaisant.

translation.en: I'm so glad you decided to come in.
And here I am!
Please.
[Jenn] I don't feel motivated to do anything.
translation.fr:
Je n'ai aucune motivation
et je n'ai goût à rien.

translation.en: Or, like, I should probably stop drinking. I should probably exercise more.
translation.fr:
Je devrais arrêter de boire
et faire plus d'exercice.

translation.en: I should probably get eight hours of sleep at night.
translation.fr: Je devrais dormir huit heures par nuit.

translation.en: Jennifer, um,
bad habits come from deeper issues.
translation.fr:
les mauvaises habitudes
ont des origines plus profondes.

translation.en: There's always a root cause.
translation.fr: Il y a toujours une cause première.

translation.en: What might that be for you?
I don't know?
Was that a question?
Yes?
Tell me about you and Brian.
He's nice. He's sweet, he's funny, he's smart. It's Brian. I don't know.
translation.fr:
Il est gentil, attentionné,
drôle et intelligent. C'est Brian, quoi.

translation.en: [exhales] Okay. Fine. Um…
We met in college.
translation.fr: On s'est rencontrés à la fac.

translation.en: We lived together. We worked together. It was like a whole thing.
translation.fr:
On a vécu et travaillé ensemble.
La totale, quoi.

translation.en: I had a miscarriage.
Actually, I was six months along, so it was a stillbirth.
translation.fr:
J'étais enceinte de six mois.
C'était un enfant mort-né.

translation.en: His name was Daniel.
I got to spend 33 minutes with him.
Brian and I were engaged, and, uh,
translation.fr: Brian et moi étions fiancés et…

translation.en: you know, we just couldn't really figure it out after that. So…
translation.fr:
On a eu du mal à refaire surface ensuite,
alors…

translation.en: Do you have anything after this?
No.
Have you ever tried hypnotherapy?
[chuckles] No. No, I have not.
Why the judgment?
I'm just not a giving-away-control person, so it's a pass.
translation.fr:
J'ai du mal à lâcher prise,
alors très peu pour moi.

translation.en: Sure. But here's the wonderful thing about hypnotherapy. All right?
translation.fr:
Je comprends mais, ce qui est formidable
avec l'hypnothérapie,

translation.en: Only you can control your subconscious.
translation.fr:
c'est que vous seule
contrôlez votre subconscient.

translation.en: -[Jenn sighs] -So, you're in control the whole time.
And it's an excellent tool for people who have suffered…
translation.fr:
C'est un excellent outil
pour les gens ayant subi…

translation.en: trauma.
Worst case scenario, it'll stop you from further destroying your poor fingers.
translation.fr:
Dans le pire des cas, ça vous empêchera
de martyriser vos pauvres doigts.

translation.en: [sighs] I don't know.
I had a mentor,
and his name was, uh, Dr. Xavier Sullivan.
He was a brilliant mind. He would say,
translation.fr: C'était un esprit brillant. Il disait :

translation.en: "Prosaic methods are reserved for the unimaginative."
translation.fr:
"Les méthodes prosaïques sont réservées
aux gens sans imagination.

translation.en: "One in search of lasting results dares to open the mind."
translation.fr:
"Pour obtenir des résultats durables,
il faut ouvrir l'esprit."

translation.en: -[Meade] Jennifer? -[Jenn exhales]
What do you want?
Just wanna be happy again, you know?
translation.fr: Je veux juste être à nouveau heureuse.

translation.en: Then let me help you.
I want you to concentrate on the light.
[Meade] Feel the weight of your body as it melts into the couch,
translation.fr:
Sentez le poids de votre corps
s'enfoncer dans le divan,

translation.en: muscle by muscle.
Starting at the toes,
the arches of the feet.
[Meade] Calves. Thighs.
All the way up,
until you arrive at the top of your head.
Now,
I want you to find yourself
in a beautiful forest.
That was an hour?
It felt like three minutes.
How do you feel?
[sighs] I don't know. I don't really remember anything.
translation.fr: Je ne me souviens pas de grand-chose.

translation.en: How'd I do?
I think you might be more open to suggestibility
translation.fr:
Vous êtes plus réceptive
à la suggestibilité

translation.en: than you imagined.
[Jenn] That was bizarre.
They called me right after I left. I start in two weeks.
translation.fr:
Ils m'ont appelée juste en sortant.
Je commence dans deux semaines.

translation.en: Are you gonna do some yoga with me, or you're just gonna lie there?
translation.fr:
Tu fais du yoga avec moi
ou tu te la coules douce ?

translation.en: This is Shavasana. It is yoga.
translation.fr: Le Shavasana fait partie du yoga.

translation.en: How many sessions did you have with Dr. Meade?
translation.fr: Tu as fait combien de séances ?

translation.en: I don't know. Maybe, um, once a week for about three months now.
translation.fr:
Je ne sais plus.
Environ une par semaine depuis trois mois.

translation.en: I've asked him to do hypnosis twice.
translation.fr: J'ai demandé deux fois pour l'hypnose.

translation.en: It's not fair. I wanna conquer all of my fears.
translation.fr:
C'est pas juste.
Je veux vaincre mes phobies.

translation.en: It's a compliment. You've already conquered all your fears.
translation.fr: Tu as déjà vaincu tes phobies.

translation.en: Hi, have you seen me and spiders? Didn't think so.
translation.fr: Tu m'as vue devant une araignée ?

translation.en: I'm really proud of you.
[whispers] You're perfect.
Jennifer?
-Hi. -[chuckling] Hi.
-You look fantastic as ever. -Oh, thanks. You too.
Haven't seen you in a couple of weeks. You're not, uh… you're not avoiding me?
translation.fr: Ça fait bien deux semaines. Vous… Vous m'évitez ?

translation.en: Oh, no. I've been meaning to schedule. It's just I've been busy--
translation.fr:
Non. Je voulais prendre rendez-vous.
J'ai été débordée.

translation.en: -Sure. -Oh…
I got the job.
-What? Really? -Yeah, I did.
-I had no doubt. -You didn't think I could do it?
translation.fr:
- Je n'en doutais pas.
- Ça vous étonne ?

translation.en: No. I never doubted you.
May I buy you a celebratory coffee?
translation.fr:
Puis-je vous offrir un café
pour fêter ça ?

translation.en: Yeah, okay.
-Yeah? -Yeah.
I did yoga with Gina, and I meditated last night.
translation.fr:
J'ai fait du yoga avec Gina
et j'ai médité, hier soir.

translation.en: Amazing.
It was three minutes, and I thought about my dead plants, but I did it.
translation.fr:
Trois minutes en n'arrêtant pas
de penser à mes plantes mortes.

translation.en: -Progress. Not perfection. -You can't say that.
translation.fr:
- Nul n'est parfait.
- À part vous.

translation.en: You're one of those people that wakes up at 5:00 a.m.
translation.fr:
Vous êtes du genre
à vous lever à 5 h du matin.

translation.en: -and you're perfect at everything. -Hardly.
And one of those who hangs out with his clients but is very private.
translation.fr:
Et vous fréquentez vos patients
tout en restant cachottier.

translation.en: All right.
I'll play.
I'm 46. Only child. [clicks tongue]
translation.fr: J'ai 46 ans. Je suis fils unique.

translation.en: Uh, I was married once to the love of my life, Amy.
translation.fr: J'ai été marié à l'amour de ma vie, Amy.

translation.en: We were happy, but she died.
translation.fr:
On nageait dans le bonheur
mais elle est morte.

translation.en: I'm so sorry.
What do they say? "Wanna make God laugh, tell him your plans."
translation.fr:
"Si tu veux faire rire Dieu,
parle-lui de tes projets."

translation.en: But, Jennifer, the important thing to remember is that being a victim is a choice,
translation.fr:
Mais, Jennifer, la morale de l'histoire,
c'est qu'on choisit d'être une victime.

translation.en: and we can let our hardships define us,
translation.fr: On peut laisser l'adversité nous définir

translation.en: consume us, or we can accept
translation.fr: et nous ronger, ou… on peut accepter

translation.en: the extraordinary abilities that we have in this life
translation.fr:
cette extraordinaire aptitude
que nous offre la vie

translation.en: to create the outcome we choose.
translation.fr: pour prendre en main notre destinée.

translation.en: -For ourselves. May I? -Mm.
[chuckling] Eyelash.
-[smooth jazz continues over speakers] -Thank you.
All right, well, enough about me. Um…
So, last we spoke, you were struggling a bit with Brian. How's it going there?
translation.fr:
Brian vous donnait du fil à retordre.
Où en êtes-vous ?

translation.en: I don't know. I have been avoiding him.
translation.fr: Je ne sais pas. Je l'évite.

translation.en: When you see Brian, uh,
is it hard for you?
Yeah.
Have you considered telling him this?
translation.fr: Avez-vous envisagé de lui en parler ?

translation.en: And if you did?
He may be hurt because we still care about each other a lot.
translation.fr:
Ça risquerait de le blesser
car on tient encore l'un à l'autre.

translation.en: Let me suggest something, and you can take it or leave it,
translation.fr:
J'ai une suggestion,
c'est à prendre ou à laisser

translation.en: but I think you'd be wise to take it. [chuckles]
translation.fr: mais je vous conseille de la prendre.

translation.en: Okay.
Invite Brian to your place for dinner tonight.
translation.fr: Invitez Brian à dîner ce soir.

translation.en: -No. -[Meade] Why not?
I can think of infinite reasons why not.
Trust me. You'll be on your turf. You can cook a good meal.
translation.fr:
Vous serez en terrain connu.
Cuisinez un bon repas.

translation.en: Tell him you got some matters you need to discuss.
I think it'd be very good for you.
translation.fr: Ça vous ferait un bien fou.

translation.en: But not easy. I mean, I'm not saying that. But-- But good.
translation.fr:
Pas facile, je vous l'accorde,
mais ça vous ferait du bien.

translation.en: 'Cause, Jennifer,
you don't have to be a victim anymore.
translation.fr: vous ne devez plus être une victime.

translation.en: [Brian] Hey, it's Brian. I got your message.
translation.fr: Salut, c'est Brian. J'ai eu ton message.

translation.en: Yeah, uh, I'll be there.
Let me know if you want me to bring anything. See you soon.
translation.fr:
Dis-moi si tu veux
que j'amène quelque chose.

translation.en: Hello?
Hey, hey, hey! [sniffles]
Where's your pen?
Where's your--
[Gina] Hey.
It was an accident, Jenn.
I mean, I almost killed him at our housewarming party.
translation.fr: J'ai failli le tuer à ma crémaillère.

translation.en: You're the one who caught it.
translation.fr: Tu lui as sauvé la vie.

translation.en: I can't remember anything.
translation.fr: Je ne me souviens de rien.

translation.en: -You're probably just in shock. -No, I'm not in shock.
translation.fr:
- Tu es sous le choc.
- Non, ce n'est pas ça.

translation.en: I'm serious. I--
I remember being at the store.
And then I'm at home sitting at the table.
translation.fr: Puis à la maison, assise à table.

translation.en: Come on. I'm gonna-- I'm gonna take you home.
translation.fr: Viens, je te ramène chez toi.

translation.en: [Meade] How's Brian?
Sorry?
Brian. How is he?
He's the same.
-[Meade] How long has it been now? -Eight days.
translation.fr:
- Ça fait combien de temps ?
- Huit jours.

translation.en: Do you remember anything else from that night?
Is there any way that I could be responsible for what happened that night?
translation.fr:
Pourrais-je être responsable
de ce qui s'est passé ce soir-là ?

translation.en: [Meade] Why do you ask?
Because I can't stop thinking about it.
The way it felt,
and the missing time.
It's like what we do here.
[inhales] Do you remember what I told you the first time we discussed hypnosis?
translation.fr:
Vous vous souvenez
de notre conversation sur l'hypnose ?

translation.en: That only you have the power, control over your subconscious.
translation.fr:
Vous seule avez le pouvoir
et le contrôle sur votre subconscient.

translation.en: -Yeah, but-- -[Meade] Jennifer, listen to me.
We all have these wounds,
and every time we let the world run us, those wounds fester.
translation.fr:
et, quand on laisse le monde nous dominer,
elles s'enveniment.

translation.en: But that's a choice based on some preconceived notion
translation.fr:
Mais c'est un choix
reposant sur des idées reçues.

translation.en: that the world can even run us in the first place.
translation.fr: Comme si le monde pouvait nous dominer.

translation.en: It's ego.
Ego derived from fear.
You follow?
So, the work we're doing is designed to eliminate that fear,
translation.fr:
Notre travail consiste donc
à éliminer cette peur

translation.en: but the moment you start to doubt our work,
translation.fr:
mais, dès que vous commencez
à le remettre en question,

translation.en: fear wins.
Is that what you want?
To let fear win?
translation.fr: Que la peur ait le dessus ?

translation.en: No.
So you need to trust me…
and keep doing the work.
Hello?
[Meade] Jennifer,
carry the fire.
[newswoman] This is a terrible turn of events,
translation.fr: Et, bien sûr, c'est une tragédie.

translation.en: as the family is reeling after losing their daughter,
translation.fr:
La famille est sous le choc
après avoir perdu sa fille

translation.en: and they still have no information from police.
translation.fr: et la police n'a toujours aucune piste.

translation.en: [newsman] …and in Portland, there's an investigation
translation.fr:
et la police n'a toujours aucune piste. À Portland, la mort de leur fille
fait l'objet d'une enquête.

translation.en: into the death of their daughter.
translation.fr:
À Portland, la mort de leur fille
fait l'objet d'une enquête.

translation.en: She'd recently taken out a restraining order on her psychiatrist.
translation.fr:
Elle avait demandé
une mesure d'éloignement contre son psy.

translation.en: Of course, it's been a game-changer to the entire case
translation.fr:
Bien sûr, cela a complètement
changé la donne

translation.en: as the police are now looking towards finding out further information as what…
translation.fr:
et la police tente de trouver
davantage d'informations…

translation.en: [newsman 2] The study into crimes while under hypnosis
translation.fr:
L'étude des crimes sous hypnose
est une première

translation.en: is new to the state criminal court.
There are currently board psychiatrists…
[sighs] I don't know, Jenn. It's just-- I get why you'd be concerned.
translation.fr:
Je ne sais pas.
Je comprends que tu t'inquiètes.

translation.en: I mean, it's not exactly comforting news, but I just-- I don't see it.
translation.fr:
Ce n'est pas rassurant,
comme nouvelle, mais j'en doute.

translation.en: No, look. It says here in the article,
"Bowen told her family she was experiencing missing time."
translation.fr:
"Andrea a dit à sa famille
avoir des absences."

translation.en: That is what happened to me. It was after I had lunch with Dr. Meade,
translation.fr:
C'est ce qui m'est arrivé
après avoir déjeuné avec lui.

translation.en: where he suggested I had Brian over for dinner.
-It just feels like a big leap. -Look at the background check.
translation.fr:
- Ça semble tiré par les cheveux.
- Regarde ses antécédents.

translation.en: You ran a background check?
Yes. Look, the only address listed is his office.
translation.fr:
Oui. La seule adresse
est celle de son bureau.

translation.en: There's no private residence, employers, or unpaid parking tickets.
translation.fr:
Pas de résidence privée,
d'employeurs, de contraventions…

translation.en: The man is basically a ghost until six months ago
translation.fr:
Aucune trace de lui
jusqu'à il y a six mois

translation.en: when someone takes out a restraining order. This is his patient,
translation.fr:
quand une patiente a demandé
une mesure d'éloignement.

translation.en: and he is torturing her. Stalking.
Psychological abuse, emotional abuse.
Maybe she was crazy.
This woman was afraid for her life,
translation.fr: Cette femme se sentait en danger

translation.en: and then three days after she files a restraining order,
translation.fr:
et 3 jours après sa demande
de mesure d'éloignement,

translation.en: she's dead.
She had a heart attack.
What if there is something else going on?
-What if he did something to her? -Okay. This is where you lose me.
translation.fr:
- Et si c'était lui ?
- C'est là que je décroche.

translation.en: Therapists use hypnotherapy to help their patients quit smoking.
translation.fr:
Les psys utilisent l'hypnothérapie
pour que les patients arrêtent de fumer,

translation.en: Not to hack into their brains and stop their heart.
translation.fr:
pas pour pirater leur cerveau
ou les tuer.

translation.en: -This is not a thing. -Yes, it-- Look, I thought that too.
translation.fr:
- C'est pas possible.
- Si. Je n'y croyais pas non plus.

translation.en: In Sweden, a group of teenagers are hypnotized to deal drugs,
translation.fr:
En Suède, des ados hypnotisés
pour vendre de la drogue

translation.en: and they experienced blackouts.
In Germany, Zebediah Cantor is hypnotized to rob banks, and he has missing time--
translation.fr:
En Allemagne, un braqueur de banque
hypnotisé a des absences.

translation.en: Okay, I get it.
And this is from that night with Brian.
translation.fr: Et, ça, ça date de la soirée avec Brian.

translation.en: He called me, Gina.
Right before I blacked out.
Dr. Meade?
I remember everything now.
translation.fr: Je me souviens de tout maintenant.

translation.en: I did it on purpose, Gina.
It-- But it wasn't me. It was, it was--
translation.fr:
Cette personne, ce n'était pas moi.
C'était…

translation.en: But I did do it.
And then I just sat there and watched.
translation.fr: Je suis restée assise à le regarder.

translation.en: I didn't do anything.
translation.fr: Je n'ai pas levé le petit doigt.

translation.en: I didn't get help.
translation.fr: Je n'ai pas appelé à l'aide.

translation.en: I didn't even move until I came out of it.
translation.fr:
Je n'ai même pas bougé
avant de revenir à moi.

translation.en: I'm not crazy. [exhales]
So, what do we do?
Hey.
Thank you so much for meeting with us, detective, on such short notice.
translation.fr:
Merci de nous recevoir
aussi rapidement, lieutenant.

translation.en: -We really appreciate it. -What can I do for you?
translation.fr:
- C'est aimable à vous.
- Que puis-je faire ?

translation.en: We wanted to ask you some questions about a woman named Andrea Bowen.
translation.fr:
On voulait vous interroger
au sujet d'une certaine Andrea Bowen.

translation.en: Six months ago, she filed a restraining order against Collin Meade.
translation.fr:
Il y a 6 mois, elle a obtenu
une mesure d'éloignement contre Meade.

translation.en: I know the case. What's your question?
Her family said that she died of a heart attack,
translation.fr: Elle serait morte d'une crise cardiaque

translation.en: but then they wanted a broader investigation.
translation.fr:
mais sa famille a demandé
d'approfondir l'enquête.

translation.en: Did that investigation ever happen?
Why are you asking?
Because Dr. Meade is our therapist.
translation.fr:
Parce que le Dr Meade
est notre thérapeute.

translation.en: Something strange is happening.
translation.fr: Il se passe des choses étranges.

translation.en: Strange how?
I've been having
weird dreams.
But they don't feel like dreams.
You've been practicing hypnosis with Dr. Meade, Miss Thompson?
translation.fr:
Vous pratiquez l'hypnose avec lui,
Mlle Tompson ?

translation.en: Collin Meade was brought in for questioning a week after Bowen's death.
translation.fr:
On a interrogé le Dr Meade
une semaine après la mort d'Andrea.

translation.en: Got us nowhere.
I wanted to keep digging.
I got a warrant, obtained his patient records.
translation.fr:
J'avais un mandat
et le dossier des patients,

translation.en: Didn't matter. Got shut down that day.
Told I couldn't even finish going through what we had.
Why?
Meade was also practicing hypnosis with Andrea.
translation.fr:
Meade pratiquait aussi l'hypnose
sur Andrea.

translation.en: It's funny. Cops using old witnesses sometimes.
translation.fr:
C'est drôle. Les flics le font parfois
sur les témoins

translation.en: Try and get them to remember things they may have seen. [clicks tongue]
translation.fr:
pour qu'ils se souviennent
de choses qu'ils ont vues.

translation.en: If it works,
it becomes evidence in court,
but if you're a victim, claiming someone used hypnosis
translation.fr:
mais toute victime
prétendant avoir été hypnotisée

translation.en: with ill intent, that kinda thing, they'll laugh you out of the room.
translation.fr:
avec de mauvaises intentions
est la risée du tribunal.

translation.en: You don't think she died of a heart attack?
Oh my God!
[detective] And then there's this.
Incoming call came from a blocked number.
translation.fr: Appel entrant avec un numéro masqué.

translation.en: -Her behavior changed when she answered. -That happened to me.
translation.fr:
- Son comportement change immédiatement.
- Ça m'est arrivé.

translation.en: What is she doing?
You ever heard of "quiescence"?
No.
It's the body's reaction to extreme fear.
translation.fr: La réaction du corps face à la peur.

translation.en: The body enters paralysis, heart rate increases, breathing intensifies.
translation.fr:
Le corps se paralyse, le rythme cardiaque
et la respiration s'accélèrent.

translation.en: But if it goes on too long, you die.
translation.fr: Si ça dure trop longtemps, on meurt.

translation.en: Maybe, technically, she died of a heart attack,
translation.fr: Elle est morte d'une crise cardiaque

translation.en: but whatever she was seeing in the elevator is what caused it.
translation.fr:
Elle est morte d'une crise cardiaque causée par ce qu'elle a vu
dans l'ascenseur.

translation.en: So, what do I think?
I think you should find yourselves a new therapist.
translation.fr:
Il est temps de trouver
un nouveau thérapeute.

translation.en: I'll talk to you later, okay?
Yeah.
Jenn?
He hypnotized me.
What?
When?
This week.
We talked about you, I--
translation.fr: On a parlé de toi, je…

translation.en: It's just-- You were so worried that something happened with Brian,
translation.fr:
Tu t'inquiétais
que ce soit de ta faute pour Brian

translation.en: and then he just--
He said he was wrong before, and then he thought that it might help me.
translation.fr:
Il a dit qu'il s'était trompé
et qu'il pensait que ça pourrait m'aider.

translation.en: It's okay, it's okay.
We'll do what Det. Rollins said. We'll stay away.
We'll figure this out, okay?
Hey, Dr. Meade, it's Jennifer Thompson. We just saw each other,
translation.fr:
Dr Meade, c'est Jennifer Tompson.
On vient de se voir

translation.en: but I was wondering if you had any last-minute appointments available.
translation.fr:
mais je me demandais
si vous aviez un rendez-vous.

translation.en: Call me back when you can. Bye.
Jennifer. Please, come in.
-I was thrilled to get your call. -Yeah, thanks for squeezing me in.
translation.fr:
- J'étais ravi que vous appeliez.
- Merci de m'avoir casée.

translation.en: Was there something in particular you wanted to talk about?
translation.fr:
Vouliez-vous discuter
de quelque chose en particulier ?

translation.en: No. Not-- Nothing really, actually. It's just, um,
translation.fr: Non. Rien, en fait. C'est juste…

translation.en: a general anxiety.
Brian's not awake yet, and so that's hard.
translation.fr:
Brian ne s'est pas encore réveillé
et c'est dur.

translation.en: Yeah.
I thought just a bit of hypnosis might help?
translation.fr:
J'ai pensé
qu'une séance d'hypnose m'aiderait ?

translation.en: Of course.
Okay.
Date of death, 11/27/2019.
-[phone line trilling] -[Wade] I'm looking for Adrienne Dorsey.
translation.fr:
URGENCE :
TÉLÉPHONE - SŒUR Je cherche Adrienne Dorsey.
C'est le lieutenant Rollins.

translation.en: This is Detective Wade Rollins with the Portland PD.
translation.fr:
Je cherche Adrienne Dorsey.
C'est le lieutenant Rollins.

translation.en: I was hoping I could ask you some questions regarding your sister.
translation.fr:
Je voulais vous poser des questions
sur votre sœur.

translation.en: Date of death, June 15, 2018. Hypnosis. Andrea Bowen. Hypnosis.
translation.fr:
Date du décès, 15 juin 2018. Hypnose.
Andrea Bowen. Hypnose.

translation.en: [Meade on recording] Was there something in particular you wanted to talk about?
translation.fr:
Vouliez-vous discuter
de quelque chose en particulier ?

translation.en: [Jenn] I thought just a bit of hypnosis might help?
translation.fr:
J'ai pensé
qu'une séance d'hypnose m'aiderait ?

translation.en: [Meade] Of course.
[Meade] Jennifer?
-[Jenn] Yes? -[Meade] Are you under?
-[Jenn] Yes. -[Meade] Good.
I'm going to ask you some questions, and you're gonna tell me the truth.
translation.fr:
Je vais vous poser des questions
et vous allez me dire la vérité.

translation.en: Why did you really come see me today?
[Jenn] To record you.
[Meade] Are you recording me now? [Jenn] Yes.
-[Meade] And why are you recording me? -[menacing music]
[Jenn] Because I want to hear what happens during our sessions.
translation.fr:
Pour savoir ce qui se passe
pendant nos séances.

translation.en: -[Meade] Do you not trust me? -[Jenn] No.
translation.fr:
- Vous ne me faites pas confiance ?
- Non.

translation.en: Why not?
[Jenn] Because I know about Andrea Bowen.
translation.fr: Parce que je sais pour Andrea Bowen.

translation.en: [Meade] Is this why you were at the police station this morning?
translation.fr:
C'est pour ça que vous étiez
au commissariat ?

translation.en: [Jenn] Yes.
[Meade] You were with Gina.
I assume she knows everything you know.
translation.fr: Elle en sait autant que vous ?

translation.en: -[Jenn] Yes. -[Meade] Yes.
Thank you for being honest, my love.
translation.fr: C'est gentil d'être franche, mon cœur.

translation.en: -[Scott] Dude, what quarter is it? -[Gina] Tell him to not--
No, they are not up by seven, bro! [laughs]
translation.fr: Non, ils ne sont pas levés à 7 h.

translation.en: -I'm serious. Hang up. -I gotta go before she kills me.
translation.fr:
- J'attends un appel.
- J'y vais ou elle va me tuer.

translation.en: -See? -No, it's Jenn!
Tell him I told him wassup! Keep me informed. Yeah, okay, peace.
translation.fr:
Passe-lui le bonjour.
Tiens-moi au jus. D'accord, peace.

translation.en: Girl, I gotta call you back. I have buyers calling any minute.
translation.fr: Je te rappelle. J'attends un coup de fil.

translation.en: -Gina. Gina, where are you? -I'm just in the car with Scott.
translation.fr:
- Gina, où es-tu ?
- Je suis dans la voiture avec Scott.

translation.en: -[Scott] Hey, Jenny. -Where are you?
We just left the house.
Turn around and go back to the house.
-I'm coming to you. -What? Why?
Could you go back to the house? You need to go back, listen to me.
translation.fr: Tu peux retourner à la maison ? Tu dois y retourner. Sors de la voiture…

translation.en: -Gina, get-- -I'm sorry, you're cutting out. I can't--
translation.fr: Tu dois y retourner. Sors de la voiture… Désolée, ça coupe… Je…

translation.en: This is them. I'll call you back.
No, Gina! He knows we were at the police station. He knows!
translation.fr:
Non, Gina !
Il sait qu'on était au commissariat. Il le sait !

translation.en: Gina?
Fucking shit!
This is Gina.
[Meade] Gina, it's Dr. Meade.
Sorry to bother you, but do you have a moment to chat?
translation.fr: Vous avez le temps de discuter ?

translation.en: I'm just in the car with Scott.
[Meade] Even better. Gina, this is how the world ends.
translation.fr: Encore mieux. Gina, c'est la fin du monde.

translation.en: What was that?
[quietly] Get it off of me.
What?
Scott.
-[Scott] Gina. -[Gina shudders]
-Get what off? -Get it off. Please!
translation.fr:
Retirer quoi ? - Retire-la. S'il te plaît.
- Il n'y a rien.

translation.en: What? There's nothing there. Get what off?
translation.fr:
- Retire-la. S'il te plaît.
- Il n'y a rien.

translation.en: -Get it off of me! Please! -Gina, relax. Gina!
[screaming] Get it off!
Gina, stop!
Get it off! Get it off!
-[truck horn blares] -[Scott] No!
Detective Rollins. What a pleasant surprise.
Care for a scotch?
Gina Kaleman died in a car accident tonight.
translation.fr:
Gina Kelman est morte
dans un accident de voiture.

translation.en: [Meade] What?
-Her husband too. -You're kidding me.
Oh my God.
How long was she a patient?
[Meade] I don't know. Maybe…
…eight months?
-[Wade] What were you treating her for? -She came to me with some, uh…
translation.fr:
- Pourquoi vous consultait-elle ?
- Elle est venue me voir pour…

translation.en: …generalized anxiety initially.
translation.fr: Un état d'anxiété généralisée, au début.

translation.en: You ever perform hypnosis on Gina?
Yes. Uh, we performed our first session last week.
translation.fr:
Oui. Notre première séance
date de la semaine dernière.

translation.en: Started small, you know?
-Explored her common phobia. -Claustrophobia?
Arachnophobia.
The last claustrophobic patient I dealt with was, uh…
translation.fr:
La dernière patiente claustrophobe
que j'ai vue, c'était…

translation.en: Well, it was Andrea Bowen, actually.
You know what I always loved as a kid?
translation.fr: Vous savez ce qui me fascinait, petit ?

translation.en: Puzzles.
I'm sure it has something to do with why I became a detective.
translation.fr:
C'est pour ça
que je suis devenu enquêteur.

translation.en: Putting the pieces together, finding the patterns.
translation.fr:
Assembler les pièces du puzzle
et identifier un schéma.

translation.en: That was always the key.
translation.fr: Ça a toujours été la clé.

translation.en: Patterns.
I looked through some of your patient files today.
translation.fr:
J'ai pu me pencher
sur les dossiers de vos patientes.

translation.en: The ones we obtained after Andrea's death.
translation.fr: Ceux obtenus après la mort d'Andrea.

translation.en: I got to chat with family members, and I noticed something.
translation.fr: J'ai parlé aux familles et ça m'a frappé.

translation.en: A pattern.
You don't use hypnotherapy on all of your patients.
translation.fr:
Vous n'hypnotisez pas
toutes vos patientes.

translation.en: Just a few, actually.
Andrea Bowen.
Lillian Dorsey.
Mona Szohr.
They share some physical characteristics,
and they also all happen to be dead.
You ever noticed that?
That pattern?
Gina Kaleman doesn't match your MO.
translation.fr:
Vous changez de mode opératoire
pour Gina

translation.en: I think you had something else in mind when it came to her.
translation.fr:
car vous aviez
autre chose en tête pour elle.

translation.en: Is there something specific you wanted to talk about tonight, Wade?
translation.fr:
Vouliez-vous discuter
de quelque chose en particulier, Wade ?

translation.en: Because if not, I should be going. It's getting late.
translation.fr:
Sinon, je vais y aller
car il se fait tard.

translation.en: [Wade] It's Detective Rollins.
-Thanks for the booze. -[Meade] Oh, Wade.
Hypnotherapy works wonders for insomnia.
translation.fr:
L'hypnothérapie fait des merveilles
pour l'insomnie.

translation.en: You wanna try it? I'll give you a free session.
translation.fr: Je vous offre une séance gratuite ?

translation.en: Thought you only took female patients.
I'll make an exception.
My phone died, or I would have called.
Um, I heard about your friend.
I just thought I could catch him saying something or doing something.
translation.fr:
Je pensais pouvoir le prendre
en flagrant délit.

translation.en: He was at the station. He's been following us.
translation.fr:
Il était au commissariat.
Il nous a suivies.

translation.en: He's smart.
Always a step ahead.
There's a reason he never hypnotized Gina until you started asking questions.
translation.fr:
Il a hypnotisé Gina
quand vous avez posé des questions.

translation.en: He knew you would go to her. She got in the way.
translation.fr:
Il savait que vous iriez la voir.
Elle le dérangeait.

translation.en: You can't blame yourself, Jenn.
translation.fr: Ce n'est pas votre faute, Jenn.

translation.en: And just why me?
Well, I don't know.
But not long after Andrea started asking questions, she was dead.
translation.fr:
Quand Andrea a commencé
à poser des questions, elle est morte.

translation.en: He's not done with you yet, or you would be too.
translation.fr:
Il n'en a pas fini avec vous
ou vous le seriez aussi.

translation.en: I got his prints. I'm gonna run 'em, see if we're missing anything.
translation.fr:
J'ai ses empreintes.
Je vais consulter la base de données.

translation.en: I should know more tomorrow.
For now,
lay low.
[Jenn] Detective.
Thank you.
Try and get some rest.
I'll call you in the morning.
Did you forget something? Hello, Jennifer.
translation.fr:
- Vous avez oublié un truc ?
- Bonsoir.

translation.en: Jennifer, stop!
You don't need to be afraid of me. I just wanna talk.
translation.fr: N'aie pas peur de moi. Je veux juste parler.

translation.en: What did I do to you to make you not trust me?
translation.fr:
Qu'est-ce que je t'ai fait
pour que tu te méfies ainsi ?

translation.en: [firmly] Think about it.
I invited you in. I listened.
translation.fr: Je t'ai accueillie, je t'ai écoutée.

translation.en: Really, you should be thanking me.
I asked you what you wanted, and I'm working so hard to give you that.
translation.fr:
Je t'ai demandé ce que tu voulais
et je travaille dur pour y arriver.

translation.en: And Brian and Gina were just gonna get in the way of your dreams.
translation.fr:
Brian et Gina
allaient faire obstacle à tes rêves.

translation.en: And now Rollins.
Don't worry. He'll be taken care of.
translation.fr: Ne t'inquiète pas. Je m'occupe de lui.

translation.en: Everything I'm doing is for you, Jennifer.
translation.fr:
Tout ce que je fais,
c'est pour toi, Jennifer.

translation.en: And I know there's been a lot of
translation.fr:
Je sais qu'il y a eu beaucoup
de travaux d'approche et d'attente

translation.en: build-up and anticipation, but…
translation.fr:
Je sais qu'il y a eu beaucoup
de travaux d'approche et d'attente mais je suis un grand romantique.

translation.en: that's just the romantic in me.
translation.fr: mais je suis un grand romantique.

translation.en: -It's almost over. -[Jenn shudders]
[quietly] You're so close.
I'll see you soon, okay?
Oh, Jennifer… -Relax. -[Jenn gasps]
[quietly] Pick up. Pick up.
[Wade] This is Detective Wade Rollins--
Come on, come on.
[woman on TV] When the police ran his prints,
translation.fr:
En vérifiant ses empreintes,
la police a découvert son identité.

translation.en: they discovered his real identity. He had changed his name.
translation.fr:
En vérifiant ses empreintes,
la police a découvert son identité. Il avait changé de nom.

translation.en: [man on TV] And who was he, really?
[woman] A killer. Wanted for murder in three states.
translation.fr:
Un tueur.
Recherché pour meurtre dans trois états.

translation.en: -[menacing music] -[TV dialogue continues]
translation.fr:
J'étais sous le choc.
J'avais l'impression de perdre la tête.

translation.en: [male narrator] Tonight, on The Crime Files.
In the fall of 2014,
seventeen-year-old Victoria Wilson disappeared from her suburban home
translation.fr:
Victoria Wilson, 17 ans, disparaît
de son foyer dans la banlieue

translation.en: in Metuchen, New Jersey,
leaving her parents and four younger siblings
translation.fr:
laissant ses parents
et quatre frères et sœurs

translation.en: heartbroken and terrified.
Three days later, her body was found in a forest 300 miles from home.
translation.fr:
Trois jours plus tard, son corps est retrouvé
dans une forêt à 500 km de chez elle.

translation.en: So, what happened to Victoria Wilson?
Billy Adler came home from school
translation.fr: Quand Billy Adler rentre de l'école,

translation.en: to find his mom dead at the dining room table,
translation.fr:
il trouve sa mère morte
dans la salle à manger,

translation.en: shot in the head.
The police ruled it a suicide. But Billy knew his mom would nev--
translation.fr:
La police conclut à un suicide
mais Billy sait que sa mère ne…

translation.en: I can't tell them I think Meade was involved.
translation.fr:
Je ne peux pas leur dire
que Meade est impliqué.

translation.en: They don't know I've been digging into this.
translation.fr: Ils ne savent pas que j'enquête.

translation.en: I'm so sorry, Rollins.
You read 'em?
And?
And I have an idea.
When Gina and I came to see you, you said something about
translation.fr: Quand Gina et moi sommes venues vous voir,

translation.en: how police sometimes use hypnosis.
translation.fr:
vous avez dit que la police
recourait parfois à l'hypnose.

translation.en: What did you mean?
A drive-by shooter speeds away from the scene.
translation.fr:
Un tireur s'enfuit à toute allure
d'une scène de crime.

translation.en: An eyewitness saw the car but can't remember the license plate.
translation.fr:
Un témoin voit la voiture
mais ne se souvient pas de la plaque.

translation.en: [clears throat] Well, maybe they do remember it.
Just not consciously.
So, we send them to a hypnotist who tries to help them recall.
translation.fr:
On l'envoie voir un hypnotiseur
pour lui rafraîchir la mémoire.

translation.en: And that will hold up as evidence?
-Sometimes. -What if we did that?
What if you sent me to whoever you use for that sort of thing?
translation.fr:
Envoyez-moi voir la personne
avec qui vous travaillez d'habitude.

translation.en: And they put me under
and try to make me recall my sessions with Meade.
translation.fr: et raviver des souvenirs de mes séances ?

translation.en: -It still may not be enough. -You just said--
translation.fr:
- Ça ne suffira pas.
- Vous avez dit…

translation.en: I said, "Sometimes."
Do you know how hard it is to charge someone with murder and get them convicted?
translation.fr:
C'est très dur d'inculper quelqu'un
de meurtre et de le faire condamner.

translation.en: But he all but confessed to me that he's responsible for Brian and Gina.
translation.fr:
Il m'a plus ou moins avoué
pour Brian et Gina.

translation.en: -You recorded it? -He said he was coming after--
Jenn.
With everything else we have, the other victims, the pattern…
translation.fr:
Avec tout ce qu'on a déjà :
les autres victimes, le schéma.

translation.en: He's planning something. I know he is.
translation.fr: Il manigance quelque chose. Je le sais.

translation.en: I don't know what, but the way he was talking last night--
translation.fr:
Je ne sais pas quoi
mais, à l'entendre hier soir…

translation.en: Please.
I just wanna try.
Please wake up.
[Meade] You were with Gina.
I assume she knows everything you know.
translation.fr: Elle en sait autant que vous.

translation.en: -[Jenn] Yes. -[Meade] Yes.
Well, thank you for being honest, my love.
translation.fr: C'est gentil d'être franche, mon cœur.

translation.en: I'll take all of your concerns into consideration.
translation.fr:
Je tiendrai compte
de vos préoccupations.

translation.en: And then he cuts it short.
Jenn.
How much do you really know about hypnotherapy?
[sniffles] Not much.
Well, it's an incredibly powerful tool.
When handled with care and integrity,
it can be a force for good.
But in the wrong hands, hypnosis can be dangerous.
translation.fr:
Mais, entre de mauvaises mains,
il peut être dangereux.

translation.en: What are you feeling?
[exhales deeply] I am having, um, some trust issues with your profession right now.
translation.fr:
Je suis actuellement sceptique
envers votre profession.

translation.en: Jenn, I understand that this may not be worth much,
translation.fr: Jenn, vous ne me croirez peut-être pas

translation.en: but you can trust me.
translation.fr: mais vous pouvez me faire confiance.

translation.en: I'm one of the good ones.
translation.fr: Je ne vous veux aucun mal.

translation.en: And I'm only gonna have a look around.
Just see what the subconscious retained from those sessions with Dr. Meade.
translation.fr:
ce que votre subconscient a retenu
de vos séances avec le Dr Meade.

translation.en: [doctor] Focus on the sound of the metronome,
translation.fr:
Concentrez-vous
sur le bruit du métronome

translation.en: keeping time.
And as you feel the weight of your body
translation.fr:
Tandis que vous sentez
le poids de votre corps

translation.en: sinking into the couch,
I want you to let everything go.
translation.fr: je veux que vous lâchiez totalement prise.

translation.en: Let the world around you slow down.
translation.fr:
Mettez en sourdine
le monde autour de vous.

translation.en: [doctor] Jenn, can you hear me?
[Jenn] Yes.
[doctor] Now, I want you to tell me everything you remember
translation.fr: Dites-moi tout ce dont vous vous souvenez

translation.en: from your sessions with Dr. Collin Meade.
translation.fr: de vos séances avec le Dr Collin Meade.

translation.en: Jenn?
Wake up, Jenn.
Jennifer!
I need you to listen to the sound of my voice
translation.fr: Concentrez-vous sur le son de ma voix

translation.en: and come back to this room right now!
translation.fr:
et revenez dans cette pièce
tout de suite !

translation.en: [Meade] My mentor was a psychiatrist.
Dr. Xavier Sullivan.
-[doctor] Wake up, Jennifer! -[Jenn screams]
What happened?
Dr. Graham, what happened?
I've never seen anything like that.
translation.fr: Je n'ai jamais vu ça de ma vie.

translation.en: He must have planted some sort of
translation.fr: Il a dû mettre une sorte…

translation.en: fail-safe or--
What's a fail-safe?
In case anybody ever tried to do what we're doing.
translation.fr: Ça contre ce qu'on est en train de faire.

translation.en: And I have no way of knowing
translation.fr: Et je n'ai aucun moyen de savoir

translation.en: how many sustained post-hypnotic suggestions he placed.
translation.fr:
combien de suggestions post-hypnotiques
il a ancrées.

translation.en: And these can be triggered at any given moment.
translation.fr: Elles peuvent se déclencher à tout moment.

translation.en: I remember something.
There was a house.
What's today's date?
It's the sixth.
-I have to go. -No, wait.
translation.fr:
- Je dois y aller.
- Non, attendez.

translation.en: There's one more thing I could try.
Look, I can't remove all of his suggestions, but maybe I could plant something of my own.
translation.fr:
Je ne peux pas effacer ses suggestions
mais je peux ajouter les miennes.

translation.en: Like a counter trigger?
Exactly.
I swear to God, this is the last time I'm doing this.
translation.fr: C'est la dernière fois que je fais ça.

translation.en: [Jenn] Rollins, it didn't work.
But I found out that Meade has a mentor named Xavier Sullivan.
translation.fr:
mais j'ai découvert que Meade
a un mentor, Xavier Sullivan.

translation.en: [Wade] Okay. [Jenn] Have you heard of "Project MKUltra"?
translation.fr:
- D'accord.
- Le projet MK-Ultra, ça vous parle ?

translation.en: [Wade] Yeah, it was a CIA project in the '60s.
translation.fr: Un projet de la CIA dans les années 60.

translation.en: [Jenn] Well, Sullivan is a hypnotist. And the CIA had recruited him
translation.fr:
Sullivan est hypnotiseur
et la CIA l'avait recruté

translation.en: to use hypnosis to plant false memories in people.
translation.fr:
pour implanter de faux souvenirs
chez des gens.

translation.en: I'm on my way to see him.
[Wade] No, Jenn, that's not a good idea.
[Jenn] He might know something about Meade that can help us.
translation.fr:
Il a peut-être des infos sur Meade
qui nous serviront.

translation.en: -[Wade] Just wait for me. -[Jenn] We don't have time.
[Wade] Jenn. Jenn!
[Jenn] Mr. Sullivan?
Hello?
Anybody home?
Mr. Sullivan?
[Jenn] Oh my God.
[Meade] It's uncanny, isn't it?
My wife was such a beautiful woman,
but then so are you, Jennifer.
-I don't understand. -Xavier was my father.
translation.fr:
- Je ne comprends pas.
- Xavier était mon père.

translation.en: He left me this place when he died.
Jennifer.
-No, just wait. -Sleep.
It's Rollins.
[man] Hey, Rollins. I ran the prints from that spoon.
translation.fr:
J'ai vérifié les empreintes
sur la cuillère.

translation.en: They belonged to a man named Julian Sullivan.
Info's in your inbox.
[Jenn's voice] You reached Jenn Thompson. Leave a message.
translation.fr: Ici Jenn Tompson. Laissez un message.

translation.en: Son of a bitch!
-[Wade] Jenn, where are you? -Rollins, it was Meade.
-His real name is Sullivan. -Jenn, tell me where you are.
translation.fr:
- Son vrai nom est Sullivan.
- Où êtes-vous ?

translation.en: He brought me back to his office.
translation.fr: Il m'a ramenée dans son bureau.

translation.en: -[Wade] But where is he? -Door is locked. I don't know!
translation.fr:
- Où est-il ?
- C'est fermé. Je sais pas.

translation.en: I'm sending units now. Hey, taxi! [groans]
Move! Drive!
How are you feeling?
Jennifer, take a seat.
You know…
I'll never forget that first time I saw you.
translation.fr:
Je n'oublierai jamais
la première fois que je t'ai vue.

translation.en: -Give me something. -[man] We've entered the building.
[Meade] You look like her,
walk like her,
you even smell like her.
There's nothing quite like a woman's scent.
translation.fr: Rien de tel qu'un parfum de femme.

translation.en: The moment you catch it, it's just…
translation.fr: Dès qu'on le sent, c'est juste…

translation.en: [quietly] Just like that.
Memories.
Come on.
[agent] On the floor. Approaching suite.
translation.fr: Je suis à l'étage près du bureau.

translation.en: There were a few others,
translation.fr: Il y en a eu d'autres

translation.en: and they seemed right at first, but ultimately,
translation.fr:
et elles semblaient faire l'affaire
mais, au final,

translation.en: they just weren't meant to be.
We're at the door.
What are you waiting for? Get in!
[Meade] I mean, I see why now, though.
They were close.
But you're perfect.
Move, move!
And now I have you all to myself.
translation.fr: Et maintenant, je t'ai pour moi seul.

translation.en: [squad leader] On my count.
[Meade] Jennifer.
You can wake up now.
[shakily] Where am I?
You're home.
-Sir, there's no one here. -What do you mean there's no one there?
translation.fr:
- Chef. Il n'y a personne.
- Comment ça, bon sang ?

translation.en: The office is empty, sir.
He wanted her to call me.
Detective Wade Rollins to dispatch.
I need a residential address to one Xavier Sullivan.
translation.fr: Il me faut l'adresse de Xavier Sullivan.

translation.en: -[dispatch] Copy that. -[tires screech]
[gulps] I can't move.
I know.
I'm not thrilled you started biting your nails again.
translation.fr:
Ça ne me plaît pas
que tu te ronges les ongles.

translation.en: We'll have to work on that.
[quietly] I know this room.
I was hoping you'd recognize it.
They weren't dreams.
Oh, they were your memories with her.
Some of my favorites.
You put them in my head
translation.fr: Tu les as implantés dans mon esprit

translation.en: because you're trying to replace her.
translation.fr: car tu cherches à la remplacer.

translation.en: The power of hypnosis.
The memory, planted in the mind,
given the right amount of care and attention,
will blossom into a whole new reality.
translation.fr: un souvenir devient une nouvelle réalité.

translation.en: A whole new life.
Make someone believe they're somewhere they're not or,
translation.fr:
On donne à une personne
une nouvelle identité,

translation.en: you know, paralyze from head to toe,
translation.fr: on la paralyse de la tête aux pieds

translation.en: all with a simple suggestion.
My mentor taught me at--
-Oh my gosh, a very young age. -Your father?
translation.fr:
- À un très jeune âge.
- Ton père ?

translation.en: Father, mentor. Interchangeable for a young boy. [chuckles]
translation.fr:
Père, mentor.
C'est pareil pour un jeune garçon.

translation.en: You're insane.
[whispers] I am not insane.
[quietly] We want the same thing.
We share wounds.
Your loss of Brian and your son Daniel.
translation.fr: Tu as perdu Brian et ton fils Daniel.

translation.en: My loss of Amy
and the life I thought we'd have together.
translation.fr: et l'avenir qui nous était promis.

translation.en: We will be that for each other.
translation.fr: On sera ça l'un pour l'autre.

translation.en: Go like this.
-And now, for the grand finale. -[sniffles]
[quietly] Don't move.
[Meade] You don't happen to know today's date, do you?
translation.fr: Tu sais quel jour on est ?

translation.en: Now you know why I waited.
Our anniversary.
I told you,
I'm a romantic. [laughs]
[softly] And there she is.
My beautiful bride.
You're perfect.
-[Jenn gasps] No. -Jennifer, don't let go.
translation.fr:
- Non.
- Jennifer, ne lâche pas prise.

translation.en: [screams] Rollins!
[Wade] Jenn!
Rollins! Rollins, I'm in here.
-Where is he? -He went out the back.
translation.fr:
- Où est-il ?
- Il est sorti par l'arrière.

translation.en: -I'm trapped. You have to help me. -[Wade] The door is locked.
translation.fr:
- Je suis coincée. Aide-moi.
- C'est fermé.

translation.en: Jenn, listen to me.
I have to go find him. You're gonna be okay.
translation.fr: Je dois le trouver. Tout ira bien.

translation.en: What? No, no, no! Rollins, no!
Please don't go! You can't go! Please don't go!
translation.fr: Ne pars pas, je t'en supplie.

translation.en: [panting] Okay. Come on. Just focus. Focus.
I'm okay. I'm okay. [panting]
[Jenn] Rollins!
[Wade] Jenn, the gun!
[Meade] Jennifer, sleep!
[Wade] Jenn? Jenn?
It's Rollins. Wake up, Jenn.
-[Jenn gasps] -That's it, wake up. That's it. No.
-You're okay. -No.
-Where is he? Where is he? -He's gone.
-It's over. You're okay. -[Jenn panting]
I called in for backup. They'll be here shortly.
translation.fr: J'ai appelé des renforts. Ils arrivent.

translation.en: You're okay.
You're…
You're a good shot.
-Oh, sorry. -It's okay.
-Here. -Thank you.
[groans] Here. Here.
You're gonna be fine.
I promise, my love.
[doctor] Jenn.
In the recording you played me,
Dr. Meade called you "my love."
translation.fr: le Dr Meade vous appelle "mon cœur".

translation.en: [Meade] Thank you for being honest, my love.
If you are ever under a post-hypnotic suggestion
by Dr. Collin Meade, and he refers to you as "my love,"
translation.fr:
le Dr Collin Meade
vous appelle "mon cœur",

translation.en: you will ignore every single trigger he put into your head.
translation.fr:
vous ignorerez chaque déclencheur
qu'il a mis dans votre tête.

translation.en: And you will see the world around you
translation.fr: Et vous verrez le monde autour de vous

translation.en: for what it truly is.
Meade?
-I'm not your love. -[groans]
translation.fr: Je ne suis pas ton cœur.

translation.en: -[Jenn] No! -No, no, no.
[whispering] Rollins.
Oh my God! Oh God.
Hey, hey! Wake up. Please wake up.
-Come on. -[weakly] Ankle.
What?
Jennifer!
[Wade] Ankle.
[Meade] Come here!
Hey. No, no, no! Hey, hey, hey! Hi.
Right here. Look at me, look at me. Look at me, look at me. Yes.
Hi, hi! You're okay, you're okay.
-[weakly] You shot me. -[Jenn] I'm sorry.
Stay-- Yeah. Stay with me. Hi. You're okay. You're gonna be okay.
translation.fr:
Reste… Oui. Reste avec moi. Hé.
Ça va. Ça va aller.

translation.en: -[whispering] Stay with me, okay? -[sirens wailing]
translation.fr: Reste avec moi, d'accord ? C'est ça.

translation.en: [Jenn] I can hear them. I hear sirens. They are coming. It's okay.
translation.fr:
Je les entends. Les voilà.
J'entends les sirènes. Ils arrivent.

translation.en: You're gonna be okay. You're gonna be okay.
translation.fr: Tout ira bien. Tout ira bien.

translation.en: I think it's great. We present it to the team at Monday's meeting.
But I'm a huge fan.
Uh-huh. Great work, Tiff.
Yeah, I'll see you then.
I'm definitely moving. [chuckles]
You'll like the new place. You don't have to. I understand.
translation.fr: Tu t'y plairas. Mais tu n'es pas obligé.

translation.en: I know you're very particular about your things.
translation.fr: Je sais que tu tiens à tes affaires.

translation.en: I'm sorry.
I'm sorry I left.
I'm sorry I didn't share my grief with you.
translation.fr: Désolée de t'avoir caché mon chagrin.

translation.en: I'm sorry that I thought losing Daniel was harder for me than it was for you.
translation.fr:
Désolée d'avoir cru que perdre Daniel
était plus dur pour moi que pour toi.

translation.en: And I know it's not my fault what happened to him.
translation.fr: Je sais que ce n'est pas de ma faute

translation.en: No matter how much I wanna blame myself.
translation.fr: même si je me sens responsable.

translation.en: But it is my fault what happened to us.
translation.fr:
Mais ce qui nous est arrivé
est de ma faute.

translation.en: And for that, I'm really, truly sorry.
The doctors say your tests are promising.
translation.fr:
Les médecins disent
que les résultats sont bons.

translation.en: That's really good news.
And when you wake up, I'll be sitting right here.
translation.fr: Quand tu te réveilleras, je serai là.

translation.en: -My condolences on your promotion. -[chuckles]
I'm regretting it already.
I left you alone, but I did wanna say thank you
translation.fr:
Je ne t'ai pas contacté
mais je voulais te remercier

translation.en: for everything.
I wasn't sure when I'd see you again, but…
translation.fr:
Je ne savais pas
quand je te reverrais mais…

translation.en: I figured you'd come around eventually.
translation.fr: Je me suis dit que tu passerais.

translation.en: A token of my appreciation.
Take care of yourself, yeah?
Well played.
